item.title: Dog-Drone
item.description:
From March to June 2018, I worked on the proof-of-concept phase of the “Dog-Drone” project.
The objective is to immobilize suspicious individuals in an indoor environment by flying multiple drones aggressively around them. My work includes the following:

  • Human detection and tracking
  • Trajectory generation
  • System integration

This work has resulted in papers published in the IEEE ICCA and IECON 2018.

Dog-Drone demo

At this stage, to prove the concept, we are using the off-the-shelf flight platform with a visual odometry integration. Right now we have built our drone platform CT-Line due to the limitation of the commercial product and have conducted tests of flying multiple drones aggressively in an indoor environment.
